resources.string: 1.Installation \nWhen the first time you start this application on your Android phone, you will find a document called \'BTController\' in your SD card. There is a \'BtControlDroid\' in it. Copy this to your computer and you should notice that a JRE is needed in your computer. Don\'t worry if you delete the \'BluetoothServer.jar\' by mistake. In Settings-Applications-Manage applications menu, select the application and press clear data. Then start this application over again and you can find \'BlueController\' document in your SD card again. Also read the README file for the OS to be able to use the server.\n

2.Some Conditions \nFirstly you should ensure that you have installed client and server on your Android phone and computer respectively. Secondly both your computer and Android phone should have a Bluetooth Adapter. And you must paired this two equipments each other. Both of the two softwares above should be opened. A simple double click can start the server application on your computer. Then you can see a small icon appears in your taskbar.\n

3.How to use\n Press \'Menu\' button to call the menu. Then select \'connect\' to call a paired devices list. Choose a paired device to make a connection between your computer and your Android phone.If the connection is established successfully, a tip will appears on screen. Now you can use every function the software support\n

4.Functions
 All functions work in the Windows and Linux OS.
 The mouse function can be used to control the mouse in the PC.
 The Keyboard function can be used to type in the PC. User can also use the three button to simulate Shift, Ctrl and Alt.
 The shortcut-key function can be used in Windows OS. MediaPlayer shortcut-keys now only support Zoom Media Player in the Windows OS.The 'backward' button will only work when playing video.
 When you use the JoyStick function, sliding the bar to the end first. Then this function can go into effect. To close this function you should slide the bar to the start.
5.Settings\n In settings you can change Joystick\'s buttons function. Every button represents a key on your computer keyboard. \n
